entry.title: Ukraine Grain Exports Surpass One Million Tons Under U.N. Deal
entry.content: The agreement to ease Russia’s Black Sea blockade of Ukraine has held up for nearly a month even as hostilities rage elsewhere in the country.

entry.title: A Violent Stalemate Sets In as Battle Lines Harden in Ukraine's East
entry.content: Russia’s troops have been exhausted by grinding offensives and Ukrainian resistance, but despite a promised counterblow in the south, neither side is able to advance.

entry.title: Arrests and Killings Drive Afghan Troops Once Allied With U.S. Into Hiding
entry.content: The Taliban appear to have launched a campaign to track down former Afghan forces to prevent them from joining an opposition group, the troops and American veterans trying to help them say.
